attributes.action: Listen to what the public actually want and act on the following issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After your losses in the local elections and Nantwich you have said you will listen to what we want. 

The majority of us want: 

Tax the rich slightly more. 

Publish the true rate of inflation to be published, ie at least treble the recently published 3% 

Abolish car tax and place it on petrol with no increase to tax on petrol. 

Reduce VAT to 5% on petrol. 

Reduce stamp duty to 2% on houses over £250K.  3% on houses over £500K. 

Put a block on all immigrants who cannot support themselves regardless of where they come from.

Give us a referendum on the EU.

There are many more but if you make a start with these then you may get re-elected.  If not then bye, bye Mr Brown.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
